sent.orig: Relax and enjoy their childhood. Read to them often. Remember how fleeting are the childhood years.
sent.trans: 让他们过得轻松，享受他们的童年。经常关注他们。记住，童年的时光总是容易消逝的。

sent.orig: Childhood is golden and pure, for which the funs of childhood provide sufficent evidence.
sent.trans: 童年，是金色而无杂质的，童年的桩桩趣事就是最有力的见证。

sent.orig: Childhood is the gift from Nature to children ample space and time to enjoy their childhood.
sent.trans: 童年是自然赋予，剥夺儿童享受童年的乐趣，就是剥夺儿童的生命权，是对自然人性的扭曲，对自然规律的践踏。

sent.orig: Recovering childhood-Why do we want to recover childhood?
sent.trans: 找回童年——为什么要找回童年？

sent.orig: Childhood soft like a dandelion. Along with my childhood years.
sent.trans: 童年好像一朵柔软的蒲公英。伴随着我童年的岁月。
